doc.field: DUTCH BULLET STATE LOAN AT 6-1/4 PCT DUE 1995

- The Dutch Ministry of Finance plans a new fixed eight-year state loan at an unchanged 6-1/4 pct. The amount and issue price will be set at tender next Tuesday, March 31. Payment is on May 1 and coupon date is May 1. No early redemption will be permitted. The issue is the fourth for payment this year.
